Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Status of Wallace Long
Dear Sir,
Wallace Long has problems at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an ERA of 8.77, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Steven Driggers
Dear Sir,
Steven Driggers has nothing more to prove at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an ERA of 1.73 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Bob Trudeau
Dear Sir,
Bob Trudeau has an AVG of .284 at AA Margate Bridges!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Status of Mike Bohn
Dear Sir,
Mike Bohn has an AVG of .164 at AA Margate Bridges!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Eric Northrop
Dear Sir,
Eric Northrop has nothing more to prove at A Somer's Point Tug Boats!
He has an AVG of .313 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Eric Godines
Dear Sir,
Eric Godines is hitting the ball well at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an AVG of .336, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1983
Subject: Ryan Mastrangelo learns new position
Ryan Mastrangelo has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Second Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1983
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Daniel Pardo

Date: Thursday, 5/22/1983
Subject: Status of Carmelo Albano
Dear Sir,
Carmelo Albano shouldn't play at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an AVG of .249 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/29/1983
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Terry Ketron



Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1983
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Linwood Grimmett
